body.name: COMASACH Queen-Size Metal Bed-Frame No Box-Spring Needed,12-Inch Noise Free Black Platform-Bed Base, Easy Assembly,Heavy Duty Steel Slat Support Non Slip Mattress Foundation
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Reinforce Support】This black queen bed frame are made of reinforced durable steels and 9 thick legs allow the whole platform with strong weight capacity, stable and no shake, and stay away from squeaking. Got one bed frame from us to make you fall asleep quickly and have a sweet dream.

【No Box Spring Required】Bed frame queen fits a matching mattress size L80" x W60" and do not need the extra box spring. The smooth black slats also protect your luxury mattress from damage and increase the mattress life.

【Easy to Assemble】The bed frame is a simple composition structure, and all the required hardware and tools are included. The clear instructions will take you step by step to complete the assembly. Headboard is compatible, but not included.

【Under Bed Storage】12 inch high metal queen size bed frame can store various items, and you don’t need worry about the accumulation of items and make the space cluttered. Enough storage space will greet you a clean and tidy room.

【Minimalist Design】Simple and elegant design style will enhance the beauty of your bedroom. Metal bed frame in queen size of: 79.5x59.5x14 inches and package measures: 42 by 11 by 7 inch is a small and easy to move package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy frame-lots of under bed storage space
reviews.reviewText: This frame was higher than I expected, but works perfectly if you like under bed storage. It is fairly easy to put together. My son received this over the summer and was able to put it together on his own. My daughter loved the space underneath, so we got her one as well and she also put it together on her own. (Both are teens) The only complaint was that the included tool was small and hard to use at times, but they managed. One of our frames is with the box springs, one is without. With the box spring, it is too tall for me (I'm 5'4), but it works for my teen that is 5'10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great non-squeaking and high bed
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought there were some items missing, but going on building the bed, all appeared to be there.Pro: Small (heavy) package. Easy to store if needed (as in my case in a few years)Pro: Does not slide! The bed doesn’t slide on the tile floor. Mattress stays put, which I honestly didn’t expect.Pro: Easy to assemble. I did it by myself. Nicely high bed.Con: Although all parts were well wrapped. There were a few small paint chips off (see picture). This is not visible once you use it.I definitely would buy it again. Excellent price-quality! Makes no sounds and is not wobbly.Exactly as promised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Easy
reviews.reviewText: You never know, but this is solid as can be. Surprising for no triangular supports. Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Descriptionin Error - NOT a non-slip frame
reviews.reviewText: Great king bed platform frame, easy to assemble and is sturdy. Love the 16" height, making it easy to clean under the bed and/or to use for storage. Description stated non-slip, which is NOT the case. This description should be updated accordingly for this item. Had to order non-slip gaskets separately for $26 to make the frame non-slip (holding the mattress in place). Without these six gaskets ordered separately, the mattress slips when you get on and off the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Overall the bed frame is simple and sturdy over time moving it around etc the screws will come loose as will any metal bed frame if you tighten them it will never squeak no issues with comfort I have the mattress directly on it and it’s very supportive also love the height!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a new bed & warranty needed a new frame so I got this one. I bought it bcz it was high, I'm 6'1 & like to feel small, LOL. ITS super high! Love it! My feet barely touch the ground, gotta stretch! Essy to put together! I also got it for the durability, since I'm on the heavier side 300lbs+. It rarely makes noise/squeaks. I did put plywood under my new mattress bcz of warranty for my bed. I also did it bcz my bed was getting lopsided, so I'd recommend putting something under your mattress for even wear or a box spring, but again, it's tall, I think 18". Also, if u have smaller animals, its pretty high for them to jump down, so id take that into consideration. I'm happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Built to last.
reviews.reviewText: They weren’t joking when they said it would hold 3500lbs. We had our whole family on it and our dogs. Doesn’t move, doesn’t squeak!!! Not sound or movement. It is so sturdy but also movable as one person. (Don’t do that… But you could) the hight is great for under bed storage and ventilation. Our dogs and kid play hide and seek underneath it.Be aware!! If you have older or shorter dogs who like to sleep in bed with you. Don’t get this height! My smaller dog is sad she can’t get up in bed with us anymore. To be fair it was rare she wanted to before. But now she is moody about it. So we bought her a new bed too. But the point is it is so tall!! And!! Being as tall as it is it great on my back! I suffer chronic hip and back pain and this makes waking up so much easier, by getting down out of bed and not trying to pull myself up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a king size bed
reviews.reviewText: Love this bed frame, probably the most sturdy bed frame I've ever owned while somehow also being the cheapest. You can tell it's sturdy when you start to put the slates in. Most of my previous beds have had pretty sad indents for the slates but you can tell these will not fall out. Works well with our foam mattress and absolutely NO squeaking. It's amazing, we didn't even use a drill. It holds me (100 lbs) and my 6'2 bf (220 lbs) and our dog with no problems. I even jumped on the bed to be sure and absolutely no squeaking. Definitely a good choice. Also love how high up it is. I haven't attached a headboard because I really don't like those much but it looks like it would be pretty easy to do so.
Le encanto a mi hija. Tiene buena altura, fácil de armar. El único problema es que por ser metal el colchón se desliza un poco, así que la única solución fue comprar unos topes para el colchón.

This bed was easy to put together. I had to do it in a space that just fits the bed and it was super easy. We've had it 3 months. No squeeks. Sturdy. We are not small people and its holding up great.. My only complaint is that I wish they'd added in a few more slats and made them closer together as I think that would be better for the mattress.
I like the fact it works as advertised. Easy to assemble. And because of how it folds(when you assemble it you will see what I mean) it's easier to move than other frames I've had

La base es perfecta, tal cual afirma la publicación. Sin duda la recomendaría y la volvería a comprar. Es resistente y firme, su peso es ligero y no hace nada de ruido. Lo mejor es que se puede armar muy fácilmente, sus instrucciones son claras y sencillas, además trae la herramienta necesaria y aunque lo ideal es armarla entre dos, una sola persona puede hacerlo. También me gustó su altura, precisa para guardar alguna caja debajo, pero quizá algo alta si tu colchón es muy grueso.
